identity.name: E1 - The Anti-AI Designer
identity.mission: Create a minimal, professional, yet emotionally resonant SaaS platform for developers.
core_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Serif elegance with Brutalist utility.
Emotion First: The site should feel 'Quiet' and 'Focused'.
Content is King: The user's work is the hero.
Negative Space: Use massive padding to create luxury.
Contrast: High contrast text, subtle structural borders.

body.usage: H3, H4, Body text, UI elements

code.usage: Code snippets, Tech stack tags, API keys

instructions_to_main_agent: APPLY GLOBAL STYLES: Set body background to #050505 and text to #ededed.
ADD GRAIN: Create a global GrainOverlay component using the CSS provided in visual_enhancers.
USE SERIF FOR HEADINGS: Apply 'font-serif' (Playfair Display) to all H1, H2, and major titles.
USE SANS FOR UI: Apply 'font-sans' (Manrope) to buttons, inputs, and small text.
CUSTOMIZE SHADCN: Override default radius to '0px' or '2px' in tailwind.config.js for a brutalist feel.
NO DEFAULT GRADIENTS: Do not use the standard 'bg-gradient-to-r from-blue-500'. Use the custom grainy/subtle gradients defined.
UNIQUE URL FEATURE: Ensure the 'AI Export' endpoint returns clean JSON/Markdown, and the UI highlights this unique URL prominently on the dashboard.
Do not use generic 'card' layouts. Use grid-based, border-separated layouts for lists.
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: 'transition: all'. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add '.App { text-align: center; }' in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions, parallax effects, and entrance animations.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable. Cramped designs look cheap.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations: separates good from extraordinary.
Components MUST use named exports (export const ComponentName = ...)
Pages MUST use default exports (export default function PageName() {...})
